widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 0), size = (150, 60), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1 is a symbolic mode MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 0), size = (100, 60), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 11), # index 11 is the scaled size MultiContentEntryText(pos = (270, 0), size = (430, 60), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 13), # index 13 is the modification time ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 45, "selectionEnabled": False }
